explains: adj. 思想体系的，意识形态的
wordGroup: ideological education 思想教育；政治教育；意识形态教育

sentences.en: Some have minimized the importance of ideological factors.
sentences.cn: 一些人已经贬低了意识形态因素的重要性。

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧都已减少。

sentences.en: The ideological makeup of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.
sentences.cn: 这些协会的意识形态构成如今与过去大相径庭。
